title: My google pixel 1 started giving no sounds . . All the sounds including microphone, speakers, tap s
content:
My google pixel 1 started giving no sounds in clouding mic, speakers, tap sounds etc. . Is there any replacemet programme for faulty google pixel manufactured before Jan 2017 as stated in this link .  . https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.theverge.com/platform/amp/2017/3/9/14868400/google-pixel-microphone-issues

Please do needful as it is a defective product.
